A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: a lot of people are angry because they don't like that this movie didn't have the traditional star wars feel to it. honestly\, i'm sorry for them\, and that they can't accept that franchises have to evolve to keep things from getting stale. this movie was the first time i have ever thought that star wars had well developed characters and realistic and strong motivations\, and i really appreciate that.
